predictions.article: USDA Announces Next Steps for Economic and Disaster Relief – March 2025
predictions.prediction: The USDA will distribute $30.78 billion in economic and disaster relief funds to farmers by mid-June 2025, with a focus on those affected by natural disasters in 2023 and 2024.

predictions.article: US Farmers Face Higher Costs and Fewer Markets from Tariffs (March 2025)
predictions.prediction: The price of potash fertilizer in the U.S. will increase by at least $100 per ton by the end of March 2025 due to new tariffs on Canadian imports.
